name: FrickGlow
description: Hides all glow-related objects (including glow from blocks).

hideGlowDecoNew.name: Hide Glow Deco
hideGlowDecoNew.description:
0: Disables this option.
1 <cp>(WINDOWS ONLY)</c>: Hide 99% of glow decorations <cy>(the 1% of glow objects that can't be hidden using this method share frame names with other solid objects in the game)</c>.
2: Hide 100% of glow decorations, <cr>but comes with the risk of crashing the game in some rare cases.</c>

hideGlowGameplayElements.name: Hide Glow from Gameplay Elements
hideGlowGameplayElements.description:
Hide glow from gameplay elements.
More specifically: jump orbs, speed portals, and jump pads.

disableGradientTriggers.name: Hide Glow from Gradient Triggers
disableGradientTriggers.description:
Hide glow from gradient triggers.

Not recommended unless if you know what you're doing.
